dict.acceptation: 鼓励( encourage的现在分词)；支持；促进；鼓动；

sent.orig: The latter can work by encouraging investment and weakening exchange rates, so also encouraging exports.
sent.trans: 通过鼓励投资和降低汇率（因此也包括促进出口），就能让后者发挥作用。

sent.orig: The students finished the work by themselves, whichwas encouraging.
sent.trans: 学生们自己完成了工作，这是非常鼓舞人心的。

sent.orig: By encouraging people to victory, for the mistakes and regrets, as a participant in the proud.
sent.trans: 人们为胜利所鼓舞，为失误而遗憾，为参与而自豪。

sent.orig: One encouraging portent is that more people are using the railway network.
sent.trans: 使用铁路运输线的人数在上升，这是个好兆头。
